title: Wandee Goodday
overview: Heartbreak and alcohol drive Dr. Wandee away from his righteous path! The transformation from a good guy to a wild spirit leads him to share an intimate night with a boxer named Yoryak Padejsuek. Then their one-night stand evolves into an unexpected "boyfriends with benefits" arrangement!Initially intended as merely fake boyfriends, they quickly find themselves swept away by their emotions! However, with both nursing secret desires for others, they're hesitant to acknowledge their true feelings.
